OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

TTStext.label: Command to convert whisper to TTS

TTSstart.label: Command to enable TTS control
TTSstart.tooltip: Follow this command by the name of the user to whom you want to give control. (No @)

ttsSmsg.value: {0}, you are now in control of TTS. Whisper: {1} followed by the messages. Please do not abuse!
ttsSmsg.label: Start message
ttsSmsg.tooltip: Message to viewer controlling TTS when starting. {0}: viewer, {1}: command

ttsEmsg.value: {0}, you can no longer control TTS. Thank you.
ttsEmsg.label: End message
ttsEmsg.tooltip: Message to viewer controlling TTS when ends. {0}: viewer

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the star/end commands

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission
